```{r}
count(whately_2015)
ui <- dashboardPage(
  dashboardHeader(title = "Wind Speed"),
  dashboardSidebar(),
  dashboardBody(
    # Boxes need to be put in a row (or column)
    fluidRow(
      box(plotOutput("plot1", height = 250)),

      box(
        title = "Controls",
        sliderInput("count(whately_2015)", "Number of observations:", 0,52560 , 100)
      )
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input,output) {
  output$plot1 <- renderPlot({
    ggplot(whately_2015, aes(x=wind_speed)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth=1)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```

```{r}

count(whately_2015)
ui <- dashboardPage(
  dashboardHeader(title = "Fun Plots"),
  dashboardSidebar(),
  dashboardBody(
    # Boxes need to be put in a row (or column)
    fluidRow(
      box(plotOutput("plot1", height = 250)),

      box(
        title = "Controls",
         sidebarPanel(
    selectInput('xcol', 'X Variable', names(whately_2015)),
    selectInput('ycol', 'Y Variable', names(whately_2015),
                selected=names(whately_2015)[[2]])
  )
      )
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input,output) {
  FilterData <- reactive({
    whately_2015[, c(input$xcol, input$ycol)]
  })
  output$plot1 <- renderPlot({
    plot(FilterData(), pch = 19, frame = FALSE)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
